A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hurts to give this rating\, but there’s reasons for it. The number 1 reason\, as mentioned within another review: “Every possible plot thread was closed in the worst possible way!” What do we have to look forward to now in the next movie/episode? There’s no more mystery... now to battle\, but we know the results of. 2nd reason: it didn’t have that Star Wars feeling... didn’t have that deep methodically aspect of the Force... it was more comedic than anything. 3rd reason: where’s the galactic concern or fear of evil taking over?! There wasn’t any... this whole Republic vs Empire felt isolated. I just feel empty. On the flip side\, great acting and visuals! Good battle scenes!
